entry.title: Migration finished
entry.content:
I have finished setting up the website, pruning and migrating content to pelican and tweaking with publishing workflow. Hopefully, this will help to ease some blog post publication…

I am kind of happy with the look’n feel from pelican-cait, as a start. I will probably start from there, iteratively. If you have any feedback or remark, I would be glad to hear them (in the comment/disqus, by email, or else).

Cheers!
